items.sentence: Tom is still just a kid, so let's forgive him.
I start off my day with a large mug of coffee.
I start my day off with a large mug of coffee.
Does Tom still sometimes fall asleep in class?
Do Tom and Mary live in the same neighborhood?
Didn't Tom and Mary used to hang out together?
Did Tom and Mary go on lots of trips together?
Tom and I were busy yesterday and couldn't go.
Tom earned good money when he lived in Boston.
Tom has been to Boston more times than I have.
